data.why:
I'm currently writing a spider for the Semantic Web, a "scutter"
    (see http://rdfweb.org/topic/Scutter ). Once completed, it will
    feature a set of classes and functions that implement a web spider,
    content filters and consumers.

    It is based on primarily RDF::Redland (not subclassed), which is
    being used as a parser and persistent storage of triples. The
    suggested package namespace is RDF::Scutter, with additional
    packages RDF::Scutter::Filter and RDF::Scutter::Consumer.
